aboutData.title: About
aboutData.text2: , I've always been passionate about creation, but it's in web and video game development that I found my way a few years ago.
aboutData.text3: I am a student in integrated preparation of the engineering school POLYTECH in Lyon. Moreover, thanks to a regular independent practice, and to a recent professional experience as a web developer, I now have solid skills in software programming in various languages.
aboutData.text4: I'm mainly focused on programming, but I'm also interested in other domains that I've been able to experiment, like UI design, level design, or music composition.
aboutData.text5: Through my learning in autonomy, in companies and in school, I was able to build a solid mastery of languages and technologies:
aboutData.text6: In video game development, I have a good level in C/C++ and C#. I mainly coded on the Unity platform for several years.
aboutData.text7: In the web, I master Sass/CSS, HTML, JavaScript, TypeScript. I'm also good in Vuejs and Angular in front-end, and NodeJs / NestJs in back-end.
